scripts.build: lerna run build --scope @single-page-markdown-website/frontend && lerna run build --scope single-page-markdown-website
scripts.clean: lerna run --parallel --stream clean && yarn run website-clean && rm -rf './*.log'
scripts.reset: yarn run clean && lerna clean --yes && rm -rf ./node_modules ./yarn.lock && yarn install
scripts.website-build: yarn run website-clean && yarn run docs && TS_NODE_PROJECT=./packages/single-page-markdown-website/tsconfig.json node --loader ts-node/esm -- ./packages/single-page-markdown-website/src/cli.ts ./README.md

simple-git-hooks.pre-push: yarn run lint && yarn run fix && yarn run build && yarn run website-build

single-page-markdown-website.title: Single-Page Markdown Website
single-page-markdown-website.description: Create a nice single-page documentation website from one or more Markdown files
